short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance GitHub Projects with column and assignee totals.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GitHub Project Enhancement adds functionality to GitHub Projects by providing real-time column and assignee totals. This extension helps users analyze project data more efficiently by offering quick insights through additional buttons, allowing you to view and summarize task progress
